name: application-template
description: A template for building HarperDB applications

scripts.login: bash -c 'read -r -p "Enter CLI target username: " USERNAME; read -r -s -p "Enter CLI target password: " PASSWORD; echo; printf "CLI_TARGET_USERNAME='%s'\nCLI_TARGET_PASSWORD='%s'\n" "$USERNAME" "$PASSWORD" > .env'
scripts.deploy: npx -y dotenv-cli -- harperdb deploy . target='http://localhost:9925' restart=rolling replicated=true
